content: I heard there's a military man around. That's fighting the queen for power in the world. using there weapons on eachother. playing a power game. and they are doing weird things to the gangsters in the city of toronto. like making us see stuff that we could only imagine. seems like the military guy has more time on his hands to look over actual life. well the queen lives hers.
